    About Me

    I am a faculty member at the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at the Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati.

    My broad area of interest is theoretical computer science. More specifically I am interested in Discrete Mathematics, Probability and Combinatorics. My current focus area is combinatorics on words

    Other topics of interests are Finance and Machine Learning.
